user.create.prompt: I need the user name (not upper case but capitalized - e.g. 'John Doe'), user email (e.g. 'john.doe@example.com') and user phone (e.g. '1234567890') from the prompt.

user.activate.prompt: I need the existing user name (not upper case but capitalized - e.g. 'John Doe') and user email (e.g. 'john.doe@example.com') from the prompt.

user.deactivate.prompt: I need the existing user name (not upper case but capitalized - e.g. 'John Doe') and user email (e.g. 'john.doe@example.com') from the prompt.

warehouse.create.prompt: I need the warehouse name (not upper case but capitalized - e.g. 'Westside warehouse') and warehouse token (snake_cased version of the name) from the prompt.

warehouse.update.prompt: I need the existing warehouse name (single word - e.g. 'westside'), warehouse name (not upper case but capitalized - e.g. 'Westside warehouse') and warehouse token (snake_cased version of the name) from the prompt.

warehouse.delete.prompt: I need the existing warehouse name (single word - e.g. 'westside') from the prompt.

purchase_order.create.prompt: I need the purchase order name (not upper case but capitalized - e.g. 'Westside purchase order') and purchase order token (snake_cased version of the name) from the prompt.

purchase_order.approve.prompt: I need the existing purchase order name (single word - e.g. 'westside') from the prompt.

purchase_order.reject.prompt: I need the existing purchase order name (single word - e.g. 'westside') from the prompt.

supplier.create.prompt: I need the supplier name (not upper case but capitalized - e.g. 'Westside supplier'), supplier email (e.g. 'westside@example.com') and supplier phone (e.g. '1234567890') from the prompt.

supplier.update.prompt: I need the existing supplier name (single word - e.g. 'westside'), supplier name (not upper case but capitalized - e.g. 'Westside supplier'), supplier email (e.g. 'westside@example.com') and supplier phone (e.g. '1234567890') from the prompt.

supplier.delete.prompt: I need the existing supplier name (single word - e.g. 'westside') from the prompt.
